WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
The language specification document (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Content/TypeScript%20Language%20Specification.pdf) contains many incomplete sections (marked as TODO: finish...).

It would be nice to have these sections completed.
Particularly the one entitled __9.4.3 AMD modules__.

As this document is the reference, for the empty sections we have to dig around the web to find the missing info (which would be found in seconds if the document was complete).

Thanks !

Comments.Message: Sorry, I meant section 9.5.1 - Code generation
